name: In the Matter of the ESTATE of William F. HESS, late of the Borough of Lewistown, Mifflin County, Pennsylvania, Deceased. Appeal of Ruth SEILER
name_abbreviation: In re the Estate of Hess

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In the Matter of the ESTATE of William F. HESS, late of the Borough of Lewistown, Mifflin County, Pennsylvania, Deceased. Appeal of Ruth SEILER.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Kenneth C. Myers, Philadelphia, for appellant.
David A. Goldman, Lewistown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
462 A.2d 205
In the Matter of the ESTATE of William F. HESS, late of the Borough of Lewistown, Mifflin County, Pennsylvania, Deceased. Appeal of Ruth SEILER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 22, 1980.
Decided June 18, 1980.
Reargument Denied July 21, 1980.
Kenneth C. Myers, Philadelphia, for appellant.
David A. Goldman, Lewistown, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
